name: Grey Soul Coffee
description: Grey Soul Coffee Roasters is a specialty coffee roaster located in Pune, India, known for serving freshly roasted Indian Specialty Arabica. They offer an all-day dining menu with vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options, along with handmade sensory stonewares and coffee brewing equipment. The roastery also features a coffee experience center where customers can witness live coffee roasting and explore the nuances of specialty coffee.
